title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
**Introducing the Perfect Christmas Wreath Garland Set for Your Home!**

This pre-lit artificial Christmas wreath garland set is a must-have for any holiday season. With its stunning design and features, it's sure to be the centerpiece of your home's decorations.

**Unique Features:**

* A beautiful 23.6-inch wreath with frosted branches, snowflake pine needle branches, 2 types of pine cones, and berry clusters
* An 8.8-foot garland that can be used to decorate walls, doors, fireplaces, or any other indoor/outdoor space
* 100 warm LED lights powered by 3 AA batteries (batteries not included)
* Timer function allows for 6 hours of light and 18 hours off, ensuring energy efficiency and minimal maintenance

**Durable and Long-Lasting:**

* Made with sturdy high-quality materials that are hypoallergenic and fireproof
* No need for water or frequent cleaning; this garland set is designed to be low-maintenance
* The durable construction ensures it will withstand the elements and last for years to come

**Easy to Use and Assemble:**

* No assembly required - simply unpack and hang
* Perfect for indoor and outdoor use, making it a versatile addition to any holiday decor

**Customer Service and Warranty:**

* 24-hour customer service availability for any questions or concerns
* 1-year warranty on the product, ensuring your satisfaction with your purchase

Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity to elevate your holiday decorations. Order now and get ready to make this Christmas season one to remember!

**Order Now and Get Ready to Shine This Holiday Season!**

**Introducing the Ultimate Christmas Decor: Pre-Lit Artificial Wreath Garland Set**

Deck your halls and warm up your holiday season with our stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. This magnificent set features a 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-foot garland, packed with premium materials and expertly crafted details.

**Components Galore!**

Enjoy the lush snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches that create a truly magical atmosphere. The set is designed to be easy to assemble, so you can focus on what matters most - spreading holiday cheer!

**Lighting Up Your Life**

Our pre-lit garland features 100 warm LED lights that require only 3 AA batteries (not included). With the timer function, you can enjoy 6 hours of twinkling magic every day, followed by 18 hours of rest. No more worrying about burnt-out bulbs or tangled cords!

**Durability and Maintenance-Free**

Built to last, our wreath garland is made from sturdy, high-quality materials that are hypoallergenic and fireproof. You won't need to water it, worry about fading, or spend hours maintaining its beauty. Simply hang it up and enjoy the show!

**Indoor & Outdoor Perfection**

Whether you're decorating your living room, bedroom, dining room, or even outdoor spaces like windows, walls, doors, or fireplaces, this versatile garland is perfect for any setting. Its durability ensures it will withstand various weather conditions.

**Your Satisfaction Guaranteed**

We stand behind our product's quality and promise a 365-day warranty. Our dedicated customer service team is available 24 hours a day to assist you with any questions or concerns.

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to elevate your holiday decor game! Order now and get ready to spread joy, warmth, and festive cheer to all who enter your home.

**Introducing the Ultimate Christmas Wreath Garland Set!**

Deck your halls with this stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, featuring a 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-foot garland that will bring joy to your home and loved ones.

This exquisite set is crafted with high-quality materials, ensuring durability and hypoallergenic properties for years of enjoyment. The sturdy construction and fireproof pins guarantee safety and longevity.

The set includes snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches, creating a lush and realistic winter wonderland atmosphere. The 100 warm LED lights are battery-operated, requiring only 3 AA batteries (not included), and feature a timer function that allows for 6 hours of illumination followed by 18 hours of rest.

Perfect for indoor or outdoor use, this wreath garland set is suitable for walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows. Its strong and durable design makes it easy to hang and maintain, with no need for water or maintenance.

**What's Included:**

* 23.6-inch pre-lit artificial Christmas wreath
* 8.8-foot pre-lit artificial Christmas garland
* Snowflake pine needle branches
* Two types of pine cones
* Berry clusters
* Frosted branches
* 100 warm LED lights with timer function

**Warranty and Customer Service:**

We stand behind the quality of our products, offering a 1-year warranty and 24-hour customer service availability.

**Order Now and Make This Christmas One to Remember!**
